data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Percy Tau (Anderlecht) has received a yellow card from Nicolas Laforge.
In the minute 32, Gent's Niklas Dorsch has been booked in Ghent.
Anderlecht take a 0-1 lead thanks to Michael Murillo.
Yari Verschaeren instrumental with a fine assist.
The first half has been concluded at Ghelamco Arena.
In the minute 45, Michael Murillo is booked for the away team.
The second-half is underway in Ghent.
In the minute 46, Roman Bezus is replacing Vadis Odjidja for Gent at Ghelamco Arena.
Roman Yaremchuk (Gent) has received a first yellow card.
Wim De Decker is making the team's second substitution at Ghelamco Arena with Dylan Mbayo replacing Anderson Niangbo.
In the minute 64, Matt Miazga (Anderlecht) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Ghelamco Arena, Milad Mohammadi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The away team have replaced Percy Tau with Joshua Cullen. This is the first substitution made today by Vincent Kompany.
In the minute 80, Kemar Lawrence for Anderlecht has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
Paul Mukairu is on a sub for Francis Amuzu for Anderlecht.
Matisse Samoise is replacing Osman Bukari for the home team.
In the minute 89, Goal! Gent draw level to 1-1 through a Roman Yaremchuk header.
Milad Mohammadi with an assist there.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
